en.title: Great News! FusionExcel Sponsors Quantum Science Products to Malaysian Contingent!
en.content:
At a Sponsorship Ceremony at Majlis Sukan Negara Malaysia's (National Sport's Council Malaysia) Commonwealth Hall, Bukit Jalil, 25th July 2008, FusionExcel is proud to announce the sponsorship of FusionExcel's range of Quantum Science products to the Malaysian Contingent who will be competing at the Beijing Olympics 2008. The Sponsorship Ceremony was officiated by YB Dato' Ismail Sabri b.Yaakub, (Youth and Sports Minister), Dato Mohd Yasin Mohd Salleh (Secretary General, Ministry of Youth and Sports) and Dato’ Zolkples Embong (Director General, Majlis Sukan Negara Malaysia, National Sports Council of Malaysia).

FusionExcel was represented by Paul Ting (CEO), Dr Siva (FusionExcel Medical Spokesman), Foo Kok Keong (former World Badminton Champion and FusionExcel Sports Advisor), Rachel Thomas (FusionExcel Presidential Director), Sam Ho (FusionExcel Presidential Director), Ms Ho Chee Ling (FusionExcel Member), Dr Li (National Sports Council Physiotherapist and FusionExcel Medical Spokesman), Angee Hoh (FusionExcel Member).

FusionExcel wishes GREAT SUCCESS to our Malaysian Contingent at the 2008 Beijing Oympics!

MALAYSIA BOLEH!

meta.description: FusionExcel is proud to announce the sponsorship of FE's range of Quantum Science products to the Malaysian Contingent.
